post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Have a small homework for you.

Unless you are concerned about having your biography published on the project homepage, send me your bio and photo (kihup.boo@gmail.com).

If you do not have a photo, I will take one for you later. If you need an example, you may take a look at:  
  http://eclipse.org/webtools/people/contributors.html#Kihup-Boo

It does not have to be in English.
Thanks in advance for your submission.
post.title: Send me your biography and photo
